channel.title: ...what the heck
channel.description:
ive helped people and everything and i havent got rep++ what the heck is up with that
im not askin for rep but why havent i gotten repped??? :confused: :|

item.description:

rep sucks, dont talk about it, i got 10 and i still do amazing things

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_

@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

item.title: ...what the heck
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Runescape.com, post:1, topic:134347”]ive helped people and everything and i havent got rep++ what the heck is up with that

im not askin for rep but why havent i gotten repped??? :|[/quote]

This is the main reason why people hate rep. You aren’t getting rep’d for helping so you stop? Let me try and explain this to you, rep is like post count, it doesn’t matter if it’s high or low, what matters is your attitude. 50k Spam posts is the same as 50k spammed rep, it means shit in the long term. People won’t respect you automatically for your rep or post count.

[quote=“3.65 kilos, post:7, topic:134347”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=185737.msg1680766#msg1680766 date=1187338953]
On mitb, rep is like a party hat.
Rep isn’t given out often, where as on mscp, it’s like bronze armor.

What mastr means its, to most of us here, rep is nothing.
It’s just a another number, like rank, and post count…

[/quote]

Shouldn’t the Mitb rep be bronze as in no one cares about it?
And Moparscape rep be Phat because some people think it’s cool but it’s useless.[/quote]

No, MITB rep is a PHat because it’s super fucking rare, and MSCP rep because it’s super common.

Runescape.com:

why dont they rep me then :mad:

People don’t NEED to rep you if they don’t want to.

Read full topic

item.title: ...what the heck
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Lol, I had this question too when I was new. Later on, I started boosting up my progress, and gotten repped several times. I’ve been repped by two staff members.

Rep, is just a number. It doesn’t give you a title, unless you have 50 rep >_>
And why do you want REP?
you’ll get it once you don’t notice. Lose the act.

Read full topic

item.title: ...what the heck
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Rep is auto fail, it means absolutely nothing, and should probably be taken out imo. After looking over your post, the reason you don’t get repped because rep spammers didn’t see your post, or is it because, YOU DON’T HELP PEOPLE, YOU ONLY ASK QUESTIONS?

Read full topic
